import React from 'react' import classes from './cartPage.module.css' import { useCart } from '../../hooks/useCart' import Tile from '../../components/Title/Tile'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Price from '../../components/Price/Price'; export default function CartPage() { const { cart, removeFromCart, changeQuantity } = useCart(); return ( <> {cart && cart.items.length > 0 &&
    {cart.items.map(item => (
  • {item.food.name}
    • ))}
{cart.totalCount}
Proceed To Checkout
} ) }
